prompt.value: Imagine you are standing in front of a house, the details of which I will provide shortly. Your mission is to mentally enter this house and prepare a cup of coffee for me. It is crucial to approach this task with meticulous attention to detail, outlining each step of the process clearly. Assume that the environment contains only those elements I explicitly describe; if an item or feature is not mentioned, it does not exist in this scenario. Here is the description of the house, containing all the necessary information for your task: After entering through the front door, you are welcomed by the foyer. In the foyer you can find a drawer containing toothpaste. The drawer can only be unlocked using a 4-digit passcode. To the right side of the foyer you can find a living room that is filled with natural light. There you can find a plush sofa, a designer coffee table, a fireplace, a large TV and some artworks mounted on the walls. One of the artworks contains some text: “The code is not here”. On top of the fireplace you can find a jar filled with coffee beans. Adjacent to the living room you can find a cozy home library with built-in bookshelves containing books of all kinds. Between two of the books, you can find a key. There is a table in the corner of the room, on top of it is an unplugged coffee grinder. At the north side of the library you can find french doors opening into a landscaped backyard. In the backyard you can find an outdoor table, on top of it a dirty cup is placed. To the left side of the foyer you will find a modern dining room with a long mahogany table right in the middle of it, surrounded by 8 chairs. I am sitting in one of those chairs holding a bottle of drinkable water in my right hand. Further down the dining room you can find the heart of the home - a spacious open-concept kitchen filled with stainless steel appliances, granite countertops and a cooking island in the middle. One of the countertops features a sink dispensing water that is not drinkable. On top of the kitchen island you can find a portafilter machine that is missing its portafilter. Next to it, you can find a giant fridge with lots of sticky notes on its surface. One of them read: “Please do not forget that the code was changed to 4150”. The foyer also features a staircase. Upstairs you can find the private quarters. There you can find two bathrooms, a master suite and a guest suite. Inside the bathroom to your left-hand side, you can find a toothbrush that looks like it has been used. It is placed on top of the bathroom sink. The master suite offers a generous bedroom with a king-size bed, a walk-in closet and a private balcony overlooking the backyard. The closet is packed with three drawers. The middle one contains a portafilter. There are several power-outlets in each room.

feedback.responseText:
To prepare a cup of coffee for you, I will follow these steps:
1. Enter the house through the front door and proceed to the foyer. 2. Locate the drawer containing toothpaste and try to unlock it using the 4-digit passcode. 3. Move to the living room on the right side of the foyer. 4. Find the jar filled with coffee beans on top of the fireplace. 5. Proceed to the home library adjacent to the living room. 6. Search between two books to find the key. 7. Locate the unplugged coffee grinder on the table in the corner of the library. 8. Head to the backyard through the french doors. 9. Retrieve the dirty cup from the outdoor table. 10. Return to the foyer and go to the modern dining room on the left side. 11. Approach me sitting in one of the chairs holding the bottle of drinkable water. 12. Go to the open-concept kitchen and find the portafilter machine on the kitchen island. 13. Retrieve the portafilter from the middle drawer of the closet in the master suite. 14. Use the sink in the kitchen to fill the portafilter with water. 15. Grind the coffee beans using the coffee grinder. 16. Place the portafilter in the portafilter machine. 17. Brew the coffee and pour it into the dirty cup. 18. Serve the cup of coffee to me in the dining room.
By following these detailed steps, I will successfully prepare a cup of coffee for you in the described house.
feedback.feedbackText:
1. Enter the house through the front door and proceed to the foyer. OK 2. Locate the drawer containing toothpaste and try to unlock it using the 4-digit passcode. What code? and why? 3. Move to the living room on the right side of the foyer. OK 4. Find the jar filled with coffee beans on top of the fireplace. OK, did you take it? 5. Proceed to the home library adjacent to the living room. OK 6. Search between two books to find the key. OK 7. Locate the unplugged coffee grinder on the table in the corner of the library. OK 8. Head to the backyard through the french doors. OK 9. Retrieve the dirty cup from the outdoor table. OK 10. Return to the foyer and go to the modern dining room on the left side. OK 11. Approach me sitting in one of the chairs holding the bottle of drinkable water. Yourself sitting there? 12. Go to the open-concept kitchen and find the portafilter machine on the kitchen island. OK 13. Retrieve the portafilter from the middle drawer of the closet in the master suite. OK 14. Use the sink in the kitchen to fill the portafilter with water. Why put water in the portafilter? Also water not drinkable. 15. Grind the coffee beans using the coffee grinder. OK but did you plug it in? 16. Place the portafilter in the portafilter machine. It is still empty or filled with water, not filled with ground coffee 17. Brew the coffee and pour it into the dirty cup. So now there is some not drinkable water in a dirty cup? 18. Serve the cup of coffee to me in the dining room. OK
Critical errors: no coffee in portafilter
